post.body: Congrats, you can now be a beta-tester for three months. :D
Remind me what your dA is?
Do you has subscription?
I freaking love it. I already pimped that shit out. XD
Automated welcome Direct Messages that don't give you free stuff do indeed suck. I like the one I got from Godiva. Free choccy!
Actually, he dyes his hair. He's naturally brunette. My mental image of Zuko singing about Katara has been realised, lol.
Naw. Draco is currently the star. I should totes find a pic of Zuko for the front wallpaper though.
"raped by egg" ! LOL.
Well we could always take a TARDIS. >.>
I will bake them shortbread cookies.
WHAT ABOUT THEM?
you are aware that i can see that, yeah?
True story. Mom and I laughed so hard... and Hannah did too once we told her why we were laughing... XD
"Hannah! Hannah! Hey Banana!" *silence* "Hey, dumbshit!" "What?"
HA. It's 8F here.
arting! you?
haiii
Oh lord. Best laugh all day.
It's okay, we only ended up watching the episodes 'cause we were all beat.
CAPSCHATTING?
Capstara chat! You coming? <333333
OWWWW.
AHHHH dA has let beta testers try out the new customizable user pages! AHHH!!! *spaz* My day has gotten better.
Home. Feel like shyte. Would very much like not to have to go out again. Alas, I think I'll probably have to. :|
Dear Twilight Fans - Please, for the love of books, someone agree that Hermione Granger could kick Bella Swan Cullen's ass.
Tried Jasmine Dragon tea at Teavana at the mall. Totally fangirled. What's more,it was DELICIOUS. Alas, cost $12 per 2oz.
My new cell phone wallpaper is Draco Malfoy. Anyone surprised? I didn't think so.
Anyways now I'm gonna get dressed for my shopping trip.
I crack myself up writing crack!fic. “So I love you,” he replied. “Most ardently. I want you back in my life." Pride&Prejudice ref FTW.
Writing more crack. Draco's gonna break his hand punching stalker!Edward. *evil laugh*
Have developed an allergy to fried okra and Arby's chicken. Joy.
Beatrice hates me and needs new sparkplugs.
"Mmm." "You sound like you need to pee. "I just did." "... IN THE CAR?!?!" "....no."
My sister apparently only answers to "dumbshit" now.
Hanging out at my uncle's house.
fell like crap. saving toasts for tomorrow. never eating arby's chicken again, btw.
One present toast (Edward Cullen) done and drying. Still have to make two Jacob Black toasts.
My mouth hurts. Finished commission toast, now to make christmas present toasts.
Bloody tired. Off to bed.
Baklava actually turned out okay. REJOICE. Now I need to clean off my desk and start working on toasts.
